recap_documents.description: ORDER adopting   40   Report and Recommendations   for  21   Motion to Dismiss filed by   Experian Information Solutions.       For the foregoing reasons, the Court OVERRULES Defendants' objections to  the R&R and ADOPTS the R&R in its entirety . Defendants' motion to dismiss, and  for judgment on the pleadings, is DENIED. The Clerk of Court is directed to terminate the motion at ECF No. 21  and mail a copy of this order to Plaintiff pro se. SO ORDERED.   (Signed by Judge Analisa Torres on 8/26/2024)   (vfr)
